column4: Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022. One (1) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=45 Female=50 Child=30 Pregnant=0 Disability=0Total=125(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Total Inmates-125. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 04.09.2022, Total Population-125 erosion continues to Bashbari par 2. on 04.09.2022. | 0,  Srijangram - Kacharipety part II and Tinkonia part I (90.652952 26.241228) | erosion has been going on at Kacharipety Part II on the river bank of Aie since 02.09.2022 in a length of approximately 300-400 m . Due to the said on going erosion the GP office of Kacharipety GP has come under threat. Date-04.09.2022. Erosion has also been reported at Tinkonia part I on the river bank of Manas -Brahmaputra in a length of 1 km approximately since 02.09.2022. Date-04.09.2022 | 0

Tamulpur - Vill- Guwebari | As report recived on dated 04-09-2022, Erosion takes place on R/B eroded Barnadi River at Guwebari. Affected length- 500m. Affected area 25 ha. (longi-91.43327, Lati- 26.3536672). | 0

Margherita - 1. T/ Dyke from Chippibasti to Moulang gaon | Severe bank erosion from Chainage 1700 m to 2100m on the left bank of Tirap river at T/ Dyke from Chippibasti to Moulang gaon embankment since 01/08/2022 till 04/09/2022. As per information received from WR department officials, the affected stretch is about 400 m in length | 0,  Doomdooma - 1. Saikhowa Protection Bund Ph-I at Chumoni(Spur no. 5 and 6), 2. Harisinga - Khalengsuar Village | Due excessive rainfall and changes of the course of the river Nonoi the Jalimukh bund extended to 350m & 200m on 8th August 2022 at khalengduar village. 15 villages may affected as reported by Water Resource Deptt. | 0
